title: M1 Mac gamers can now play at 1600p with Nvidia GeForce Now’s RTX 3080 tier
content: Nvidia on Thursday announced a major to its GeForce Now game streaming service that vastly improves the experience for M1 Mac users. The key update is that members of the GeForce RTX 3080 tier can now play at 1600p resolution, the native resolution of the M1 MacBook Air and 13-inch MacBook Pro. GeForce Now is a service for Mac […]
